var ViewBuilder = require('./ViewBuilder')

var NATIVE_BRIDGE_NAME = "GetSocialCordova";

var NotificationsViewBuilder = function() {
}

NotificationsViewBuilder.prototype.show = function() {
  var option = this.toJson();
  cordova.exec(null, null, NATIVE_BRIDGE_NAME, "createNotificationsView", [option]);
}

NotificationsViewBuilder.prototype.close = function() {
  var option = {}
  cordova.exec(null, null, NATIVE_BRIDGE_NAME, "closeNotificationsView", [option]);
}

NotificationsViewBuilder.prototype.__proto__ = ViewBuilder.prototype;

module.exports = NotificationsViewBuilder;
h
